name: Puzzling Plants
description:
Meet the objectives of each level by using rocks to cleverly control plant growth. Flowers will expand into all unoccupied squares around them. Red plants and blue plants will combine to make purple plants. Each place or removal of rock will cost one action. 

Controls: Clicking on the rock icon selects the rock. Click on an empty tile to place the rock. Clicking on a rock with no tool selected will remove a rock and add it back to the toolbox. The clock displays how many actions are left in the turn.  Each placing or removing of a rock uses an action. Advance turns by clicking the clock in the bottom right.  The sun shows how many remaining turns to meet the objective.
